Posts.Content: My wife was prescribed this to reduce brain swelling after they discovered her breast cancer had metastasized and she now had brain tumors. It is a steroid and can have very powerful psychotic side effects and triggered explosive rage in my wife after a few days and has pretty much destroyed our marriage. Since you are only taking it for three days, you might not experience many side effects, but the website below describes different experiences patients have had with this drug. http://www.askapatient.com/viewrating.asp?drug=11664&name=DECADRON
Posts.Title: Decadron
